meaningMnemonic: The <radical>horns</radical> of the creatures who drink <radical>alcohol</radical> have a <radical>measurement</radical> so large that they are <kanji>revered</kanji> the world over. The horns are revered both for their size and potency. The horns can be used in medicine, so they are very valuable, those alcoholic monster horns.
readingMnemonic: The reason you are interested in these <kanji>revered</kanji> horns so much is that your <reading>son</reading> (そん) is sick and you need one of these revered horns to make a medicine for your son. Only with the revered power of the horns will you be able to save your son’s life.
